plot: Two Brazilians living in London, working together, both in relationships. When they find that they have become attracted to each other, Luis thinks of sex and Marta wants to diffuse the tension. How awkward can it get?
title: Luis and Marta Work Together
plot_es: Two Brazilians living in London, working together, both in relationships. When they find that they have become attracted to each other, Luis thinks of sex and Marta wants to diffuse the tension. How awkward can it get?
plot_en: Two Brazilians living in London, working together, both in relationships. When they find that they have become attracted to each other, Luis thinks of sex and Marta wants to diffuse the tension. How awkward can it get?
